task_description: scene: Containers: tray, coaster. Objects: hammer, screwdriver, pot-with-plant, book./task: Organize the tools into the tray and the decorative items onto the coaster./action: Pick hammer and place into tray. Pick screwdriver and place into tray (wrong). Pick screwdriver from tray and place into coaster (recovery). Pick pot-with-plant and place onto coaster.

scene: Containers: shoe_box, wooden_box. Objects: stapler, can, mouse, french_fries./task: Store office supplies in the wooden_box and non-office items in the shoe_box./action: Pick stapler and place into shoe_box. Pick can and place into wooden_box (wrong). Pick can from wooden_box and place into shoe_box (recovery). Pick mouse and place into wooden_box. Pick french_fries and place into shoe_box.

scene: Containers: fluted_block, dustbin. Objects: bottle, cup_without_handle, mug, red_block, green_block, yellow_block./task: Sort the blocks by color into the fluted_block and the other objects into the dustbin./action: Pick red_block and place into fluted_block. Pick green_block and place into fluted_block (wrong). Pick green_block from fluted_block and place into dustbin (recovery). Pick yellow_block and place into fluted_block. Pick bottle and place into dustbin. Pick cup_without_handle and place into dustbin. Pick mug and place into dustbin.
